model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Hey, did I tell you that I went to the post office today?
No, you didn't. What did you do there?
I paid for postage to send a package. It was a bit of a hassle, but I got it done.
That's good. I hate going to the post office. It's always so crowded.
Yeah, it was pretty busy today. But I needed to get this package sent out.
Speaking of packages, remember that time when you got stranded because you couldn't drive yourself home from a night out with friends?
Ugh, don't remind me. That was such a disaster.
It was definitely not one of your finest moments. But it's good to see that you're being responsible now and taking care of things like sending packages.
Thanks. I'm trying to be more responsible and reliable these days.

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Personal Improvement and Accomplishments', 'Related Summaries': 'Co-workers A talks about personal improvement and accomplishments with Co-workers B.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Co-workers B: I completely agree. Speaking of making a positive impact, have you been working on improving your own life lately? ### Co-workers A: Actually, yes. I've been trying to be more responsible and reliable, and I'm proud to say that I haven't been late to work in weeks. ### Co-workers B: That's great to hear! It's never too late to make a positive change.' }
```
